goal.ch: 本課程提供離岸風電的海事工程整體性論述，建立離岸海事工程的跨領域知識系譜，包含重要的專業與離岸風電相關實務，並與業界密切合作，提供最新的離岸風電發展趨勢為情境。修習本課程後，學生能對於離岸海事工程職涯有基本認識，並具備進入離岸海事工程領域的知識，同時能規劃下一階段於離岸海事工程領域的學習路徑。
goal.en: This course offers a comprehensive foundation on maritime engineering in the offshore wind energy sector, establishing an interdisciplinary knowledge framework. It includes critical professional aspects and practices related to offshore wind energy. We will collaborate intensively with the industry, learning in the context of the latest development trends. Upon completing this course, students will have a basic understanding of careers in offshore maritime engineering, possess the knowledge to enter the field, and be able to plan the next phase of their learning path.

第2週  參觀離岸風電展（校外教學）
第3週  世界離岸海事工程現況與趨勢
第4週  台灣海域環境
第5週  海洋環境與地質調查
第6週  風波潮流與海洋環境載荷
第7週  土壤力學基礎
第8週  期中考週－期中報告繳交與報告
第9週  風場設計
第10週 船舶與航海原理
第11週 海事船舶
第12週 風機安裝
第13週 產業參訪（校外教學）
第14週 佈纜
第15週 整備、運作與維護
第16週  期末考週－期末報告繳交與報告

第18週 「彈性教學」
outline.en:
Week 1 -Introduction and course requirement
Week 2 -Field visit: Wind Energy Asia
Week 3 -Global and local maritime engineering development
Week 4 -Ocean environment in Taiwan’s water
Week 5 -Marine environment and geological, geophysical survey
Week 6 -Environmental fluid loads
Week 7 – Geophysics in marine environments
Week 8 - Midterm Examination - Midterm Report Submission and Presentation
Week 9 -Design of offshore wind farms
Week 10- Ships and seafaring basics
Week 11- Vessels for offshore wind energy
Week 12- Installation of wind turbines and other infrastructures
Week 13- Field visits
Week 14- Cable laying
Week 15-Mobolization, operation and maintenance of OFW
Week 16 - Final Examination - Final Report Submission and Presentation
Week 17 Alternative Learning
Week 18 Alternative Learning
